name: Dragon Star Varnir DLC Bundle
description:
In this day and age, content makes the world go round. Same goes for the world of Varneria. Lucky for you, you can grab the DLC Bundle for your Varneria travels!


The DLC Bundle includes the following DLC:
  • Level Limit Breach 2
  • Ultimate Weapon Collection
  • Ultimate Armor Set Trio
  • Ultimate Accessory Set Trio
  • Level Limit Breach 3
